name: Nook & Cranny
description:
Nook & Cranny is a mobile phone(Android) Augmented Riddle Hunting Game that interacts with the artworks that colors the walls of the CIIT Interweave Building of the CIIT Philippines College of Arts & Technology.

NOTE: Game can only be played in the CIIT Building.

The game is played by answering riddles by scanning the artworks in the Interweave Building. 

This game was developed as a Thesis Project.
